courseSection0.text:
Admission Requirements
Students must demonstrate a foreign language proficiency in Spanish equivalent to third-year college level to be admitted to the certificate.
Certificate Requirements
For degree-seeking students, certificates will be awarded only at time of degree completion.
Prerequisite Courses
None

courseSection2.text:
Other Requirements

A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) is required in all courses used to satisfy the certificate.
At least 12 hours used in the certificate must be earned at UCF within the participating departments.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Independent study and substitute courses/new courses are allowed at the director's discretion.
